title: Discount Warehouses - New In Abu Dhabi

content.text: Discount Warehouses
Hunting for cheap deals in Abu Dhabi? This guide reveals the best discount warehouses, 1-dirham shops, and hidden bargain stores locals actually shop at.
Google Ads
Day To Day – Electra Street
Best AED 1-20 Bargain Store in Abu Dhabi
Address: Electra Street, near KM Trading, Al Danah
Hours: 9:00 AM – 11:00 PM daily
Price Range: AED 1 – 20 per item
Specialties: Kitchen items, notebooks, snacks, houseware, makeup, toys, stationery
Why Visit: Everything under AED 20. Perfect for household essentials, school supplies, and small gifts
Local Tip: Visit weekday mornings to avoid crowds. Check seasonal items section for best deals
Google Rating: 4.4★ – “From kitchen items to notebooks, everything under 20 AED”
View on Google Maps
Aswaq Al Emarat
Hidden Gem for School Supplies & Snacks
Address: Najda Street, near ADNOC building, Al Zahiyah
Hours: 8:00 AM – 12:00 AM daily
Price Range: AED 1 – 15 per item
Specialties: School supplies, notebooks, snacks, plastic containers, cleaning supplies
Why Visit: Rivals Day To Day prices with less crowding. Great for bulk purchases
Local Tip: Best selection of Arabic/English notebooks and school bags in August-September
Google Rating: 4.2★ – “Hidden gem for notebooks, snacks and school bags”
View on Google Maps
Al Fan Al Emarati Discount Warehouse – Mussafah
Largest Clothing & Fashion Outlet in Abu Dhabi
Area: Mussafah Industrial Area, near Dalma Mall zone
Address: Mussafah Industrial Area, near Dalma Mall zone
Hours: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM daily
Price Range: AED 10 – 100 per item
Specialties: Designer clothes, branded shoes, handbags, perfumes, accessories, jeans
Why Visit: Huge warehouse with brand-name items at 70% off retail prices Local Tip: Best perfume deals in Abu Dhabi. Visit Thursday evenings for new arrivals
`Google Rating: 4.5★ – “Huge and cheap. Best prices on perfumes and jeans. Feels like a local Primark”
View on Google Maps
Wear Mart – Mussafah
Best Place for Work Uniforms & Professional Clothing
Hours: 9:00 AM – 9:00 PM daily (Closed Friday 12-2 PM)
Price Range: AED 15 – 80 per item Specialties: Work uniforms, safety shoes, kitchen gadgets, office wear, bags .
Why Visit: Quality work clothing at fraction of mall prices. Great for professionals.
Local Tip: Excellent selection of steel-toe boots and chef uniforms
Google Rating: 4.3★ – “Good-quality items and basic office wear at fraction of price.
View on Google Maps
One to Ten Gift Store
Electronic Accessories & Small Gifts Hub
Hours: 10:00 AM – 10:00 PM daily
Price Range: AED 1 – 10 per item
Specialties: Phone cables, chargers, toys, gift items, phone accessories, electronics
Why Visit: Cheapest phone accessories in Abu Dhabi. Perfect for tech needs
Local Tip: Great place for iPhone/Samsung cables and portable chargers
Google Rating: 4.1★ – “If you have time, you can find really good stuff at very good prices”
View on Google Maps
World Brands Discount Warehouse – Mussafah
Fashion Clearance & Brand Name Outlet
Address: Near Mussafah Shabiya 9
Hours: 10:00 AM – 9:00 PM daily
Price Range: AED 20 – 150 per item
Specialties: Brand clearance items, designer bags, dresses, travel trolleys, shoes
Why Visit: Genuine brand items at clearance prices. Best for fashion lovers
Local Tip: New stock arrives Wednesday mornings. Check handbag section for luxury finds
Google Rating: 4.0★ – “Sometimes crowded, but if you dig, you’ll find amazing clearance pieces”
View on Google Maps
